description:
Ten months after her engagement to Justin Theroux, Jennifer Aniston seems to be no closer to saying "I do."在跟Justin Teroux订婚10个月之后，Jennifer Aniston离说“我愿意”的阶段似乎并没有更进一步。

As fans eagerly wait for her to become Mrs. Theroux, multiple sources tell PEOPLE that plans for the much-anticipated nuptials have slowed down.Jenifer的粉丝们都很期盼她早日成为Theroux夫人，但是根据《人物》杂志收到的多方反馈却是婚礼相关进程都已放缓。

A few months ago, arrangements were in full swing, says a source who speaks to Aniston often. "Wedding bands were designed and Jen was deciding on a dress," says the source. The actress had a date in mind, too – this spring.一位经常跟Aniston聊天的消息人士说，几个月前，各种婚礼准备还是在以全速前进状态进行：“婚礼上献唱的乐队正在确定，而Jen也在挑选婚纱。”她希望的结婚时间是今年春天。

Now, with both Aniston, 44, and Theroux, 41, overloaded with work commitments and a massive house renovation, "wedding talk has stopped." 现在44岁的Aniston和41岁的Theroux正忙着工作和房子装修，“关于婚礼的讨论已经停止了。”

title: 珍妮弗•安妮斯顿和未婚夫的结婚进程放缓
